About the Company: Prerna Infrabuild Ltd is one of the recognised construction company of Ahmedabad.The group has developed some of the finest Commercial and Residential projects and is renowned for its Quality & Elegance. Projects like Doctor House and Prerna Tirth are the landmarks of Ahmedabad city. A unique idea to start Private safe Deposit lockers Facility in India to cater an individual needs all 365 days a year was launched and the company is proud to have this facility at two places with a more than 1000 clients.The company`s current projects includes Prerna Green Woods- Prerna Green Woods a plotting scheme at Andej in the land area of 4 M. Sq.Feet at distance 16 KM from Ring Road, Bopal Junction.Prerna Arbour- Prerna Arbour offers offices and showroom starting from 2500 Sq. Ft. and onwards on high street of C.G.Road.
